meaningMnemonic: You have to <radical>sickle</radical> the <radical>rice paddy</radical> today because it's your <kanji>turn</kanji>. This kanji also means <kanji>number in a series</kanji>, which is a lot like a turn. For example, you're number 3, so your turn will be number 3.
readingMnemonic: This <kanji>turn</kanji>-based rice sickle system is a contest as well! But, you are disappointed to find out that you have been <reading>ban</reading>ned(ばん) from the game because of the performance enhancing steroids you've been taking.
